SEARCH

Package generellSim

package generellSim
This package include the information regarding a general simulator where the classes inside this package can be extended depending on the specific simulator.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Event
    Abstract base class for events within the simulation.
    EventQueue
    Manages the queue of events in the simulation, ensuring events are processed in chronological order.
    Sim
    Abstract class for the simulation.
    SimState
    Represents the general state of the simulation.
    SimView
    The abstract class for observing the state of the simulation (SimState).
